title: Laptop freeze
body: When IÂ´m playing like in the 10 min the screen freezes and the only way to unfreeze is to turn off the laptop by pressing the power botton 10 secs, i have uninstalled and re-installed lol several times, i have windows 10, all the updates are ok, i do not know what else to do please help me.

replies.body: If your entire pc is freezing up it's possible that it could be overheating. Check your fans to make sure there isn't anything blocking them, and I'd also suggest running through our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to check for driver updates in case this is some of kind driver error.
the thing is that this only happens when I play, I could be in the lap for hours and nothing would happen, also sometimes when it freezes the mouse coursor can still move.
